original_title: “i miss you” and other ways to say “i love you”
overview: A short film chronicling a long-distance relationship, taking place largely online during Covid-19; depicting the joys and struggles that came with it. The online space converges with the physical first and last meeting place of the couple, focusing on the now empty places to ask “how can you love someone you’ve never met?”
tagline: Can you miss someone you’ve never met?
title: “i miss you” and other ways to say “i love you”
